text: lm yanfae al'iiman 'ahl qaryat amanuu eind meaynt aleadhab 'iilaa 'ahl qaryat yunis bin matta, fa'iinahum lmma ayqnu 'ana aleadhab nazl bihim tabuu 'iilaa allah taealaa tawbatan nswha, flmma tbyan minhum alsidq fi tawbatuhum kashf allah eanhum eadhab alkhizy baed 'an aqtarab mnhm, watarakahum fi aldunya ystmtewn 'iilaa waqt 'iinha' ajalhm
